message-unknown_alert.message: Could not parse message. Please make sure this is a valid AirGap message. You can try to handle this message in {{otherApp.name}} by using the "Relay" button below.

message-not-supported_alert.message: Please use {{otherApp.name}} to handle this message. You can click the "Relay" button below to do that.

not-supported-alert.title: Oops
not-supported-alert.message: Deeplinking is only supported on mobile devices.

app-not-found.title: Oops
app-not-found.message: It looks like you don't have {{otherApp.name}} installed on this device.
